Child-To-Parent Phrase: must belong to one and only one
Definition: This is the relationship between how much money a customer spends on a product(s) and how many products they purchase in the store at any given time.
This is the relationship between the amount of products that are flowing throughout any given store at any given time.
The relationship that shows how valuable a retail store is to GOAC.
This is the relationship where the GOAC corporation can measure millions of different KPIs for upper management's needs.
